sentences.sContent: The desert continually encroaches on the fertile land.
sentences.sContent_eng: The desert continually encroaches on the fertile land.
sentences.sCn: 沙漠在不断地侵蚀肥沃土地。

sentences.sContent: If you continually question why he included this section at all, then you will be frustrated.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you continually question why he included this section at all, then you will be frustrated.
sentences.sCn: 如果您不断地询问他究竟为什么要包含此部分，那么您将感到失落。

words.tran: 连续的，持续的；继续的；连绵不断的
